org.safs.staf

Class STAFProcessHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.staf.STAFProcessHelpers

  • public class STAFProcessHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves the only allowed instance of a STAFHelper for a given process name. This prevents attempts of registering multiple processes with the same name.
    Since:
    NOV 09, 2003
    NOV 09, 2003 (Carl Nagle) Original Release
    APR 26, 2011 (LeiWang) Modify method unRegisterALLHelpers() If we clear the holders before calling unRegisterHelper(processname), unRegisterHelper(processname) may not work.
    MAY 17, 2012 (Carl Nagle) Enhance launchSTAFProc to make more than 1 attempt.
    Author:
    Carl Nagle

    • Method Detail

      • registerHelperClass

        public static STAFHelper registerHelperClass(java.lang.String process_name,
                             java.lang.Class clazz)
                                      throws SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        create/Register/Retrieve a STAFHelper with the given process name. The returned STAFHelper will already be initialized.

        If the STAFHelper was not already registered then a STAFHelper of the provided subclass will be instantiated.

        Parameters:
        process_name - The name of the process to register with STAF.
        clazz - Allows us to specify a specific STAFHelper subclass to instantiate, if needed.
        Returns:
        STAFHelper instance
        Throws:
        SAFSStafRegistrationException - may be thrown if the process was registered by some other means outside of the control of this class.
        SAFSSTAFRegistrationException

      • registerHelper

        public static STAFHelper registerHelper(java.lang.String process_name)
                                 throws SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        Create/Register/Retrieve a STAFHelper with the given process name. The returned STAFHelper will already be initialized unless an exception is thrown. Will instantiate a STAFHelper.class instance if not already registered.
        Parameters:
        process_name - The name of the process to register with STAF.
        Returns:
        STAFHelper instance
        Throws:
        SAFSStafRegistrationException - may be thrown if the process was registered by some other means outside of the control of this class.
        SAFSSTAFRegistrationException

      • unRegisterHelper

        public static void unRegisterHelper(java.lang.String process_name)
                             throws SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        unRegister a STAFHelper with the given process name. This will only unregister the STAFHelper if it is the last known reference to the object.

        The user can also simply wait until the end of everything and call the unRegisterALLHelpers method. This will unRegister all known STAFHelpers for all processes ever registered via this class.

        Parameters:
        process_name - The name of the process to unRegister with STAF.
        Throws:
        SAFSStafRegistrationException - may be thrown if some problem occurs.
        SAFSSTAFRegistrationException

      • unRegisterALLHelpers

        public static void unRegisterALLHelpers()
        Unregisters ALL STAFHelpers for ALL processes ever registered via this class. Only recommended at the end of absolutely everything in SAFS testing.

      • launchSTAFProc

        public static STAFHelper launchSTAFProc(java.lang.String processName)
                                 throws SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        Attempt to launch STAF. Instantiates and registers STAFHelper.class instance by default. Normally you would only do this if other operations detected it was not running.
        Parameters:
        processName - to automatically register with STAF and detect ServiceLoader.
        Throws:
        SAFSSTAFRegistrationException

      • launchSTAFProcClass

        public static STAFHelper launchSTAFProcClass(java.lang.String processName,
                             java.lang.Class clazz)
                                      throws SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        Attempt to launch STAF. Normally you would only do this if other operations detected it was not running.
        Parameters:
        processName - to automatically register with STAF and detect ServiceLoader.
        a - STAFHelper subclass Class to instantiate.
        Throws:
        SAFSSTAFRegistrationException
        See Also:
        registerHelperClass(String, Class)

      • shutdownDebugLog

        public static void shutdownDebugLog()
                             throws SAFSException
        Attempt to shutdown the SAFS Debug Log, if any.
        Throws:
        SAFSException

      • shutdownSTAFProc

        public static void shutdownSTAFProc()
                             throws SAFSException
        Attempt to shutdown STAF. Normally you would only do this if all running engines, services, and queues would not prevent a successful shutdown. For example, you should NOT attempt to shutdown STAF if there is a running SAFS Engine or independent SAFS Debug Log process running. Those should be shutdown first.

        However, calling this routine will make an attempt to shutdown any running SAFS Debug Log.

        Throws:
        SAFSException
        See Also:
        shutdownDebugLog()

      • hasSTAFHelpers

        public static boolean hasSTAFHelpers()
        Returns:
        true if we have ANY initialized STAFHelpers stored.

      • getSTAFHelperProcessNames

        public static java.util.Enumeration getSTAFHelperProcessNames()
                                                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieve the Process Names of any registered STAFHelpers--regardless of Class.
        Returns:
        Enumeration of registered Process Names, if any. Thus, the Enumeration could have 0 entries.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException
